net.proteusframework.data.filesystem

Class StreamStorage

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.proteusframework.data.filesystem.StreamStorage
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable, LocalizedNamedObject, NamedObject
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    DatabaseStreamStorage, NativeStreamStorage

    @Entity
public abstract class StreamStorage
extends Object
implements LocalizedNamedObject, Serializable

    Defines an interface for storing streams that are related to FileEntity instances. All methods should be expected to block until complete, perhaps for long periods of time. If responsiveness is an issue the caller must make arrangements for background execution.

    The FileEntity.getStreamId() property may be maintained by implementations to identify the stream and should be treated as opaque by code outside of the particular StreamStorage implementation in use. If the property is not used it should be maintained at the zero value by the implementation to avoid confusion.

    Author:
    Pat B. Double (double@i2rd.com)
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      • equals

      • get

        public abstract InputStream get(FileEntity fe)
                         throws IOException
        Get an input stream for a file entity. The FileEntity.getStreamId() property may be used to identify the stream, as well as FileSystemEntity.getId().
        Parameters:
        fe - the file entity.
        Returns:
        InputStream, never null.
        Throws:
        IOException - if the stream cannot be found or other error occurs retrieving the stream.

      • getChangeNotificationAddress

        public String getChangeNotificationAddress()
        Get the storage change notification address.
        Returns:
        the email address to send notifications when stream storage changes for a file entity. Defaults to CHANGE_NOTIFICATION_DEFAULT.

      • getId

        @NotNull
public Long getId()
        Get the entity ID.
        Returns:
        Long.

      • getLocationSummary

        public abstract String getLocationSummary(FileEntity file)
        Get the location summary for the stream. This method is intended for diagnostic purposes, such as error reporting. The intended audience is developers and system administrators. Enough information must be provided such that the data may be found quickly and precisely. Examples include "Database in table stream, record 53", "/mnt/share/path/file-5112.jpg", etc.
        Parameters:
        file - the file.
        Returns:
        String, never null.

      • getOwner

        @NotNull
public DirectoryEntity getOwner()
        Get the root directory that owns this storage module. Stream storage modules are owned by root directories which determine the available modules a child entity may use.
        Returns:
        DirectoryEntity.

      • getSummary

        public abstract LocalizedText getSummary(LocaleContext localeContext)
        Get a summary of this object, this should include appropriate parameters, if any. The result should be brief and human readable. Examples are "Database", "NFS on /mnt/share", etc.
        Parameters:
        localeContext - the locale context.
        Returns:
        LocalizedText.

      • getURL

        public URL getURL(FileEntity file)
           throws UnsupportedOperationException
        Get the URL for the stream data, if available. Security must be handled by the implementation. It is appropriate to throw an UnsupportedOperationException due to security concerns. Note that this URL will be given to the client so that distribution of the URL can not be controlled. If an URL is available then hasURL(FileEntity) must return true.
        Parameters:
        file - the file whose data will be served.
        Returns:
        URL, never null.
        Throws:
        UnsupportedOperationException - if an URL cannot be provided.

      • hashCode

        public int hashCode()
        Based on the entity ID.
        Overrides:
        hashCode in class Object

      • hasURL

        public boolean hasURL(FileEntity file)
        Determine if an URL is available for the stream data.
        Parameters:
        file - the file.
        Returns:
        true if getURL(FileEntity) will return a value.

      • isRemote

        public abstract boolean isRemote()
        Determines if stream storage should be considered stored in remote resources, generally across a WAN. The method does not imply blocking behavior of other methods, all methods should be considered blocking with possibly large amounts of time. It does indicate the possibility of a higher rate of failure in accessing the stream and possibly much longer time delays.
        Returns:
        true if the streams are stored in remote resources (WAN, etc.), false otherwise (local, LAN, etc.)

      • put

        public abstract void put(FileEntity fe,
       InputStream is)
                  throws IOException
        Put a stream for a file, replacing any existing stream. The FileEntity.getStreamId() property must be set to a meaningful value or zero if not used. The FileEntity will be persisted after this method call by the caller. The input stream must be closed by this method.
        Parameters:
        fe - the file entity.
        is - the stream, must not be null. Closes stream when finished.
        Throws:
        IOException - if an error occurs saving the stream.

      • remove

        public abstract boolean remove(FileEntity fe)
                        throws IOException
        Remove a stream for the file. If the stream does not exist this method should return false, not throw an exception. The FileEntity.getStreamId() does not need to be set to zero by this method, the caller will take appropriate action.
        Parameters:
        fe - the file entity.
        Returns:
        true if a stream was removed, false if no stream was removed.
        Throws:
        IOException - if an error occurs removing the stream.

      • setChangeNotificationAddress

        public void setChangeNotificationAddress(String changeNotificationAddress)
        Set the storage change notification address.
        Parameters:
        changeNotificationAddress - the email address to send notifications when stream storage changes for a file entity. Defaults to CHANGE_NOTIFICATION_DEFAULT.

        public void setId(Long id)
        Set the entity ID.
        Parameters:
        id - the id to set.
